name: Texas Ground Turkey Burrito
author: PINKLADY04
summary: Using lean ground turkey, spices, black beans, and salsa, you will create a tasty, quick burrito.
ingredients: 1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste
1 pinch onion powder, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 (8 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
¼ cup shredded reduced-fat Cheddar cheese
directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Add ground turkey and cook until no longer pink, about 5 minutes
Season with garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and black pepper
Stir in salsa and black beans; cook until heated through, about 5 minutes
Cover tortillas with moist paper towels; microwave on high for 30 seconds
Spoon turkey mixture into each tortilla
